QuestData.Title: And Last But Not Least... Danforth
QuestData.Description: Danforth's being tortured on the other side of the cave. There's no telling what state he's in by now! We need to get over there and save him!$B$BOverlord Barbarius has the key to the lever holding Danforth up. We work together as a team and we can kill that bastard, Barbarius. Once Barbarius is dead, we use his key to get Danforth down and get out of here!$B$BReady?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Overlord Barbarius and recover the Blackrock Lever Key. Use the Blackrock Lever Key to free Danforth.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well look at that! The team's all here... everyone but Keeshan.
QuestData.RewardText: About damn time you sissies showed up. My arms were gettin' tired.
